name: AMZNing Simulator
description:
AMZNing Simulator is a game about the near future of production and logistics. In this game you are tasked with stocking the shelves in a shipping magazine. The faster you do your job, the higher your grade. You are also expected to get help from worker bots. Thing is, their software is very bad and usually they end up getting in the way of your grade, but if you sync up you can achieve much better results than doing the job alone!

Controls:  W/S/A/D - Movement LMB - Pickup box/Throw box
